message.name: INF_GENERATEINSTRUMENTS_SUB
message.locale: Report from GenerateInstruments batch job run on %1s at %2s.

message.name: INF_ILI_RECORDS_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Instruction Line Item record(s) processed: %1n

message.name: INF_NEWINTERESTILI_RECORDS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of Interest record(s) created: %1n

message.name: INF_NEWSURILI_RECORDS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of additional Surcharge Instruction Line Item records(s) created: %1n

message.name: INF_NEWTAXILI_RECORDS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of additional Taxation Instruction Line Item records(s) created: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_LBYINSTRUMENTS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of Liability Instrument record(s) created: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_PMTINSTRUCTIONS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of Payment Instruction record(s) created: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_PMTINSTRUMENTS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of Payment Instrument record(s) created: %1n

message.name: ERR_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, payments for up to %2n nominees will not have been processed.
